casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Felix PUENTIS, Appellant, v. Edward CORSI, Commissioner of Immigration, Appellee. No. 454. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 6, 1932. William Matthews, of New York City, for appellant. Ira Koenig, of New York City, for ap-pellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
